summary: Feature request to drop Ruby 3.1 support and add Ruby 3.4 support, enabling the use of Ruby's `Data` class instead of `Struct` in the SDK.
userImpact: Users on Ruby 3.1 will need to upgrade to a newer version, while users on Ruby 3.4+ will benefit from improved SDK implementation using modern Ruby features.
proposedFix: Drop Ruby 3.1 support, add Ruby 3.4 support, and leverage `Data` instead of `Struct` for SDK implementation.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to update version support and modernize the SDK codebase.
keyQuote: Confirm with users that 3.1 is not a requirement. In addition to dropping 3.1 support, we can now leverage `Data` instead of `Struct` if we want.
